-- Dick Cheney Dick Cheney said Friday he has called a "truce" with old colleagues over the Iraq war and is going hunting again. Colin Powell who criticized his policies as vice president, Dick Cheney replied, I prefer to think of it as a truce, Brian. "Clearly we had differences on subsequent policy issues," he said.
